headline: 5 Revealing Analyst Questions From Allegion’s Q1 Earnings Call
summary: Allegion’s first quarter results were met with a positive response from the market, reflecting management’s emphasis on nonresidential demand in The Americas and continued margin expansion. CEO John Stone credited growth to strong execution, particularly in the nonresidential segment, and highlighted the role of the company’s distribution channel partners. Stone noted, “This was another demonstration of the resilience of our business model as we expanded our industry-leading margins and continue
